name: Parasyte
description:
Parasyte is an action racing game where you'll take control of an alien parasyte trying to infect a human body.

  • Feed your hunger with red blood cells.
  • Avoid crashing into white blood cells
  • Destroy enemy parasytes

Every race is unique, procedurally generetad levels that offer a continuous battle for the top of the evolutionary chain while the heartbeats of your victim surround the vessel walls.
